body: LEAD: Two black men were set upon and beaten by a group of whites in the Bensonhurst section of Brooklyn Friday night, in what authorities said was a racial attack, and the police have arrested a white teen-ager in connection with the incident. body: LEAD: IF your child dances the afternoon away to Phantom Tollbooth, you might consider covering the walls and floors of the playroom in cork.
